pageContext.claim: “We got rid of the individual mandate, the most unpopular thing, which essentially, killed Obamacare.”
pageContext.analysis: This is mostly false. The Trump administration reduced the individual mandate to zero, so that people no longer pay a penalty. The vast majority of the Affordable Care Act -- the coverage guarantee for people with pre-existing conditions, the health insurance marketplace and subsidies, and an expansion of Medicaid -- remains in place.
